Create GroundStation PLANA;
GMAT PLANA.CentralBody = Earth;
GMAT PLANA.StateType = Spherical;
GMAT PLANA.HorizonReference = Sphere;
GMAT PLANA.Location1 = 42.48304;
GMAT PLANA.Location2 = 23.445973;
GMAT PLANA.Location3 = 1100.0;
GMAT PLANA.Id = 'StationId';
GMAT PLANA.IonosphereModel = 'None';
GMAT PLANA.TroposphereModel = 'None';
GMAT PLANA.DataSource = 'Constant';
GMAT PLANA.Temperature = 295.1;
GMAT PLANA.Pressure = 1013.5;
GMAT PLANA.Humidity = 55;
GMAT PLANA.MinimumElevationAngle = 7;
